      Changes Name of Camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      newName - The new name of the Camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp name is not unique or length of camp name is too short

      public void toggleVisibility(String campID, boolean visibility) throws EditCampException
      toggles the visibility of the camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      visibility - The boolean visibility of the camp
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp already has students registered
      See Also:

    • changeStartDate

      public void changeStartDate(String campID, String date) throws InvalidDateException
      Change start Date of Camp
      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      date - The start Date of the Camp
      Throws:
      InvalidDateException - if start date does not follow order of Today -> Registration Closing Date -> Start Date -> End Date
      See Also:
      • StaffCampController.changeStartDate(String, String)

    • changeFaculty

      public void changeFaculty(String staffID, String campID, boolean openToFacultyOnly) throws EditCampException
      Allows staff to change faculty of camp between own faculty and NTU

      Checks whether camp contains students from other faculties when open to staff faculty instead of whole NTU

      Parameters:
      staffID - The unique ID of the Staff
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      openToFacultyOnly - boolean value indicating whether Camp is open to Faculty only or whole of NTU
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp currently contains students not from staff faculty
      See Also:
      • StaffCampController.changeFaculty(String, String, boolean)

    • changeCampCommSlots

      public void changeCampCommSlots(String campID, int slots) throws EditCampException
      Change camp committee slots for camp

      checks for error when downsizing the camp committee slots

      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      slots - The number of Camp Committee slots set
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp committee slots not within range 1-10,

      and slots smaller than number of camp committee members registered

      See Also:
      • StaffCampController.changeCampCommSlots(String, int)

    • changeCampParticipantSlots

      public void changeCampParticipantSlots(String campID, int slots) throws EditCampException
      Change camp partcipant slots for camp

      Checks for error when downsizing the camp participant slots

      Parameters:
      campID - The unique ID of the Camp
      slots - The number of Camp Participant slots set
      Throws:
      EditCampException - if camp participant slots is not at least 1

      and slots smaller than number of camp participant members registered

      See Also:
      • StaffCampController.changeCampParticipantSlots(String, int)

      studentID - The unique ID of the Student
      Returns:
